container-title: He is the author of The Young Einstein (1985), Cultural Imperialism and Exact Sciences
title: Lewis Pyenson, trained as a physicist and a historian of science, has taught at the University of Montreal since 1973. He is associate editor of Historical Studies in the Physical and Biological Sciences, and he sits as a curator of the Osier Library for the History of Medicine at McGill University
and Neohumanism and the Persistence of Pure Mathematics in Wilhelmian Germany
He and his wife Susan Sheets-Pyenson have three children
